transcript.text:
Hello, I'm Évelyne Reybert,
 the mother of Julien Vinson,

who was murdered on April 4, 2020,
 during the Romans-sur-Isère attack,

by a Sudanese migrant
 whose name is Abdallah Ahmed-Osman,

who injured five people and killed two,
 including my son,

who was at his house due to lockdown,
 who was going to open the shutters,
before he was stabbed.

He was with his son, he told him:
 "Go back into the house now and lock the door."
And then he was slaughtered.
He stabbed my son 22 times
while shouting "Allahu akbar!"
So I'm completely shattered...

I think everything would be different
 with Éric Zemmour.
We absolutely need him as president because
France is really turning into a hellhole.
The thugs, the terrorists,
the judges also – I disapprove their rulings.
They told me he'd get life imprisonment,
but it's actually 30 years.
If he shows good behavior, he'll be out in 22 years.

With Éric Zemmour,
 I would like him to get life in prison.
Just like in the US or everywhere else.
So Éric, if you can hear me,
please be elected.
Please.
As you can see, it doesn't only happen to others.
It could be your own kid, your granddaughter...
So try to put yourself in other people's shoes,
try to sense that it could happen to you one day.
And that is terrible.
So please, vote for Zemmour.
